files.patch:
@@ -134,1 +134,1 @@
-    __ push(method_holder); // keep holder around for diagnostic purposes
+    __ push(method_holder, true /*is_pair*/); // keep holder around for diagnostic purposes
@@ -168,1 +168,1 @@
-    __ pop(method_holder); // restore stack layout
+    __ pop(method_holder, true /*is_pair*/); // restore stack layout

@@ -2946,1 +2946,1 @@
-  __ push(rklass_tmp); // rdi is callee-save on Windows
+  __ push(rklass_tmp, true /*is_pair*/); // rdi is callee-save on Windows
@@ -3080,1 +3080,1 @@
-  __ pop(rklass_tmp); // Restore callee-save rdi
+  __ pop(rklass_tmp, true /*is_pair*/); // Restore callee-save rdi
@@ -3152,1 +3152,1 @@
-  __ pop(rklass_tmp); // Restore callee-save rdi
+  __ pop(rklass_tmp, true /*is_pair*/); // Restore callee-save rdi
@@ -3194,1 +3194,1 @@
-    __ pop(rklass_tmp); // Restore callee-save rdi
+    __ pop(rklass_tmp, true /*is_pair*/); // Restore callee-save rdi
@@ -3207,1 +3207,1 @@
-  __ pop(rklass_tmp); // Restore callee-save rdi
+  __ pop(rklass_tmp, true /*is_pair*/); // Restore callee-save rdi
